meanings.definition: Relating to levitation or the act of rising or floating in the air.
meanings.sent1: The magician performed a levitational trick that amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The levitational powers of the superhero allowed them to soar through the sky effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The levitational cupcakes seemed to float off the table, much to the surprise of the party guests.
meanings.sent4: Her levitational grace on the dance floor made her appear weightless, like a feather in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The levitational sensation of being weightless in the pool was both exhilarating and calming.

meanings.definition: Having the ability to levitate or defy gravity.
meanings.sent1: The levitational rock hovered above the ground, leaving everyone in awe.
meanings.sent2: The levitational abilities of the alien allowed it to move without touching the surface.
meanings.sent3: The levitational cat seemed to ignore gravity as it effortlessly climbed up the tree.
meanings.sent4: His levitational skills in the video game made him unbeatable, floating above all obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The levitational balloon drifted upwards slowly, as if guided by an invisible force.
